Description: Sardonyx cameo engraved with two portrait-heads in profile, probably Ptolemy III and Berenice; Ptolemy is beardless and wears a fillet; Berenice's hair is gathered high on top of her head.
Bibliographic references: Gem / Catalogue of Engraved Gems & Cameos, Greek, Etruscan & Roman in the British Museum (3575)
Associated names: Portrait of: Ptolemy III Euergetes I (probably)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
